rule:
package rules

import cn.tobs.drools.model.Person
import cn.tobs.drools.fact.RuleProcessedResult

rule "Age Income Check - Age should less than 65"
    when
        person : Person(age < 65,income > 1000)
        ruleProcessedResult : RuleProcessedResult();
    then
        ruleProcessedResult.setPass(true);
		System.out.println("Rule pass.");
end
